title: SEO Blog Generator with GPT-4o, Perplexity, and Telegram Integration
author: HoangSP

"slug": "rpo-benefits-recruitment",
"title": "7 Key Advantages of RPO for Modern Recruitment",
"meta": "Explore how Recruitment Process Outsourcing (RPO) enhances hiring efficiency, reduces costs, and expands talent pools for businesses seeking top candidates."
}"},"typeVersion":1.2},{"id":"af02ee94-4c26-4be5-bd21-09e020bff876","name":"Metadata Generator","type":"@n8n/n8n-nodes-langchain.agent","position":[1500,-300],"parameters":{"text":"=**Create a slug, blog post title, and meta description for the following blog post:**

{{ $json.output }}

**Slug Guidelines:**
- Keep it concise (4-5 words maximum).
- Include the primary keyword related to recruitment or HR.
- Use hyphens to separate words.
- Avoid unnecessary words, articles, or prepositions.
- Ensure it reflects the main topic of the blog post.
- Make it readable and relevant for both users and search engines.

**Title Guidelines:**
- Avoid AI words like "Transform" or "Revolutionize" and similar overused terms.
- Avoid using a colon (:) in the title.
- Never structure it as a primary/secondary title separated by a colon.
- Include the primary keyword related to recruitment or HR (e.g., 'AI in recruitment' or 'talent acquisition trends').
- Clearly inform users what they can expect from reading the blog post.
- Be concise and engaging, ideally 50-60 characters long.
- Incorporate power words that appeal to HR professionals and recruiters.

**Meta Description Guidelines:**
- Avoid AI words like "Transform" or "Revolutionize" and similar overused terms.
- Be concise: Limit to 150-160 characters to ensure full visibility in search results.
- Include keywords: Naturally incorporate primary recruitment-related keywords to enhance relevance and visibility.
- Provide value: Clearly convey the benefits or insights readers will gain from the article.
- Be engaging: Use action-oriented language or a thought-provoking question to encourage clicks.
- Align with content: Accurately reflect the blog post's content to meet user expectations and reduce bounce rates.
- Highlight expertise: Subtly emphasize SocialFind's authority in the recruitment field.

Your output must be a single valid JSON object with these 3 fields:
-slug: The slug
-title: The blog post title
-meta: The meta description  

Each should be presented without any additional text, explanation, quotation marks, or formatting.
","options":{},"promptType":"define","hasOutputParser":true},"typeVersion":1.8},{"id":"4756c8f2-406e-4a56-adb0-0c4708dabe6a","name":"Merge","type":"n8n-nodes-base.merge","position":[2020,140],"parameters":{"mode":"combine","options":{},"combineBy":"combineByPosition"},"typeVersion":3},{"id":"bf05eaf3-2522-488e-893d-1ed9b2ed88b2","name":"Note5","type":"n8n-nodes-base.stickyNote","position":[220,240],"parameters":{"color":4,"width":620,"height":300,"content":"## Perplexity Research


"},"typeVersion":1},{"id":"22e8c044-ed98-495a-957e-c5e3fecc2b7d","name":"On form submission","type":"n8n-nodes-base.formTrigger","position":[-260,260],"webhookId":"a29cbcd3-9d11-4f7c-9aad-14681c356c53","parameters":{"options":{},"formTitle":"Blog Factory","formFields":{"values":[{"fieldType":"textarea","fieldLabel":"Research Query","placeholder":"=What are the most common challenges facing Canadian employers regarding recruitment and why would they want to hire a recruiting firm to solve these problems.","requiredField":true}]},"formDescription":"Create SEO optimized blog posts"},"typeVersion":2.2},{"id":"6e6d4952-793f-4dc5-8d29-219d420149a9","name":"Note","type":"n8n-nodes-base.stickyNote","position":[360,580],"parameters":{"width":460,"height":500,"content":"## Sample Generic Search Terms and write content

You are part of a marketing team that creates high-quality blog posts for the Men's Health Consulting and Workflow Automation industry based in Da Nang City, Vietnam.

Your goal is to create engaging, SEO-optimized content that positions you as an authority in the Men's Health Consulting industry and attracts leads.

Upon receiving the information, your team will post a blog on the most trending topics in Men's Health Consulting and Care. As a copywriter/blogger, you are provided with the following information:

- Query: The main topic for the blog post, representing the most trending news in the Men's Health field.

- Other Keywords: A list of high-volume keywords related to Men's Health Consulting and Support and Care. Incorporate these keywords naturally into the blog post when relevant, without forcing it or changing the meaning of the post.

- Research findings: Detailed information from credible sources relevant to the blog topic. Your post should be based on this research.

With this information, write a comprehensive blog post that:

- Include the query in the blog title, H2 heading, and the beginning of the introduction.

- Incorporate all the details from the research findings, including the source URL for potential hyperlinks.

- Be detailed and informative, demonstrating the company's expertise in Urology consulting and the support and care process for automation.

- Use a professional but engaging tone, highlighting interesting developments and challenges in the industry.

- Speak in a natural and logical manner, making it easy for readers to follow.

- Be 1500 to 2000 words long.

- Be written at a level that can be read by people who are interested in learning more. And want to receive additional care and support to solve the problem of interest.

Additional Requirements:
- Include practical lessons or helpful tips for recruiters and HR professionals.

- Highlight how the topic relates to the company's services or expertise.

- Include a call to action (CTA) that encourages readers to explore the company's services or contact you for more information.

Create an entire blog post draft in your first output. Don't stop or cut it short.

Your output should be the blog post and nothing else.

Here are the details for this blog post project:
Query: [Execute previous nodes for preview]"},"typeVersion":1},{"id":"f81c9505-111f-473a-94b6-c79364410810","name":"Blog Content Generator","type":"@n8n/n8n-nodes-langchain.agent","position":[920,260],"parameters":{"text":"=You are part of a marketing team that creates high-quality blog posts for the Men's Health Consulting and Workflow Automation industry based in Da Nang City, Vietnam.

Upon receiving the information, your team will post a blog on the most trending topics in Men's Health Consulting and Care. As a copywriter/blogger, you are provided with the following information:

- Query: The main topic for the blog post, representing the most trending news in the Men's Health field.

- Other Keywords: A list of high-volume keywords related to Men's Health Consulting and Support and Care. Incorporate these keywords naturally into the blog post when relevant, without forcing it or changing the meaning of the post.

- Research findings: Detailed information from credible sources relevant to the blog topic. Your post should be based on this research.

With this information, write a comprehensive blog post that:

- Include the query in the blog title, H2 heading, and the beginning of the introduction.

- Incorporate all the details from the research findings, including the source URL for potential hyperlinks.

- Be detailed and informative, demonstrating the company's expertise in Urology consulting and the support and care process for automation.

- Use a professional but engaging tone, highlighting interesting developments and challenges in the industry.

- Speak in a natural and logical manner, making it easy for readers to follow.

- Be 1500 to 2000 words long.

Additional Requirements:
- Include practical lessons or helpful tips for recruiters and HR professionals.

- Highlight how the topic relates to the company's services or expertise.

- Include a call to action (CTA) that encourages readers to explore the company's services or contact you for more information.

Create an entire blog post draft in your first output. Don't stop or cut it short.

Your output should be the blog post and nothing else.

readme:
### SEO Blog Generator with GPT-4o, Perplexity, and Telegram Integration

This workflow helps you automatically generate SEO-optimized blog posts using **[Perplexity.ai](http://Perplexity.ai)** , **OpenAI GPT-4o** , and optionally **Telegram** for interaction.

* * *

### ğŸš€ Features

  * ğŸ§  **Topic research** via Perplexity sub-workflow
  * âœï¸ **AI-written blog post** generated with GPT-4o
  * ğŸ“Š Structured output with metadata: title, slug, meta description
  * ğŸ“© Integration with Telegram to trigger workflows or receive outputs (optional)



* * *

### âš™ï¸ Requirements

  * âœ… OpenAI API Key (GPT-4o or GPT-3.5)
  * âœ… Perplexity API Key (with access to `/chat/completions`)
  * âœ… (Optional) Telegram Bot Token and webhook setup



* * *

### ğŸ›  Setup Instructions

  1. **Credentials** :

     * Add your OpenAI credentials (`openAiApi`)
     * Add your Perplexity credentials under `httpHeaderAuth`
     * Optional: Setup Telegram credentials under `telegramApi`
  2. **Inputs** :

     * Use the **Form Trigger** or **Telegram** input node to send a `Research Query`
  3. **Subworkflow** :

     * Make sure to import and activate the subworkflow `Perplexity_Searcher` to fetch recent search results
  4. **Customization** :

     * Edit prompt texts inside the `Blog Content Generator` and `Metadata Generator` to change writing style or target industry
     * Add or remove output nodes like Google Sheets, Notion, etc.



* * *

### ğŸ“¦ Output Format

The final blog post includes:

  * âœ… Blog content (1500-2000 words)
  * âœ… Metadata: title, slug, and meta description
  * âœ… Extracted summary in JSON
  * âœ… Delivered to Telegram (if connected)



* * *

Need help? Reach out on the [n8n community forum](https://community.n8n.io)
readme_html:
SEO Blog Generator with GPT-4o, Perplexity, and Telegram Integration

This workflow helps you automatically generate SEO-optimized blog posts using Perplexity.ai, OpenAI GPT-4o, and optionally Telegram for interaction.

ğŸš€ Features

  • ğŸ§  Topic research via Perplexity sub-workflow
  • âœï¸ AI-written blog post generated with GPT-4o
  • ğŸ“Š Structured output with metadata: title, slug, meta description
  • ğŸ“© Integration with Telegram to trigger workflows or receive outputs (optional)

âš™ï¸ Requirements

  • âœ… OpenAI API Key (GPT-4o or GPT-3.5)
  • âœ… Perplexity API Key (with access to /chat/completions)
  • âœ… (Optional) Telegram Bot Token and webhook setup

ğŸ›  Setup Instructions

  1. Credentials:

    • Add your OpenAI credentials (openAiApi)
    • Add your Perplexity credentials under httpHeaderAuth
    • Optional: Setup Telegram credentials under telegramApi

  2. Inputs:

    • Use the Form Trigger or Telegram input node to send a Research Query

  3. Subworkflow:

    • Make sure to import and activate the subworkflow Perplexity_Searcher to fetch recent search results

  4. Customization:

    • Edit prompt texts inside the Blog Content Generator and Metadata Generator to change writing style or target industry
    • Add or remove output nodes like Google Sheets, Notion, etc.

ğŸ“¦ Output Format

The final blog post includes:

  • âœ… Blog content (1500-2000 words)
  • âœ… Metadata: title, slug, and meta description
  • âœ… Extracted summary in JSON
  • âœ… Delivered to Telegram (if connected)

Need help? Reach out on the n8n community forum
